modName: Jolgeirr Barrow- The Tomb Of The Snow Prince
summary: Adds the final resting place of the infamous Snow Prince of the Falmer to Soltheim.  Requires Dragonborn & Dawnguard
descriptionHtml:
This Mod adds Jolgeirr Barrow back to Solstheim.  Within You\'ll Find the remains of Falmer pilgrims paying homage to their dead leader, and his restless spirit wielding the legendary Spear Of The Snow Prince.  His Enchanted Ancient Falmer Armor set can be found in the chest in the lower level of the Tomb, and the Spear, his most prized possession, is still in his ghostly grip.

This mod is pretty much where I want it to be, the barrow just needs navmeshing and I\'ll probably clutter it some more, as I love that claustrophobic feel.

Credits:
Bethesda (Skyrim)
Issae (Nordic Spears Mod)

Requires Dawnguard & Dragonborn.

Dont use any assets without the authors explicitly stated permission.
author: Jyggalagman
